alarm.shorttitle: SIPX Relay Public Address Discovery Failed
alarm.resolution: The STUN Server did not return any information that can be used to determine the public address of the Relay Service. Reconfigure your STUN server settings in the System > NAT page to point at a functioning STUN server.

alarm.description: The STUN Server '{0}' is functioning OK.
alarm.resolution: This message is informational. No action is needed.

alarm.shorttitle: SIPX Bridge Public Address Discovery Failed
alarm.resolution: The STUN Server did not return any information that can be used to determine the public address of the internal SBC. Reconfigure your STUN server settings in the Internal SBC settings to point at a functioning STUN server.

alarm.description: The STUN Server '{0}' is functioning OK.
alarm.resolution: This message is informational. No action is needed.

alarm.description: The ITSP Account '{0}' disallowed an operation because of Authentication failure.
alarm.resolution: Check your ITSP Account domain and password and restart the SIP Trunking Service.
